title: PUAC - The Peri-Urban Agricultural Centre
description: Organic veggies delivered, or you can order and collect at this warehouse location in the afternoons. The current production amounts to 70 tons of chemical free vegetables per year, 30 different kinds of high value European leaf plants, aromatic plants, fruit plants, and some root plants. PUAC has a storage facility in Phnom Penh and a fleet of vehicles and motorcycles to distribute every day (except Sunday) products from the farms to customers. See the website for more addresses & info. For home delivery of organic vegetable baskets call Mao Bora on 012-469-899.
